Uses of Class
buildings.Building

  • Packages that use Building 
    Package Description
    buildings  
    game  
    task  

    • Uses of Building in buildings

      Subclasses of Building in buildings 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Base
      A Base is a Building that is automatically placed on the map and is used as a center for resource storage and drone operations.
      class  Converter
      Converter is a Building that turns certain resources into other resources.
      class  Engineering
      Engineering is an Building used to repair Drones and to build certain items.
      class  Farm
      Farm is a Building used to terraform the planet.
      class  MethanePlant
      MethanePlant is a Building used for refueling drones.
      class  MineBuilding 
      class  SolarPlant
      SolarPlant is a Building used for recharging the Drones with solar energy.

    • Uses of Building in game

      Methods in game that return Building 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Building Map.findNearest(Tile start, BuildingEnum type)
      This method, as per the name, finds the nearest Building of the appropriate type.
      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Building 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.LinkedList<Building> Map.getAllBuildings() 
      Methods in game with parameters of type Building 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Map.build(Building b)
      This method converts Tiles to a sort that has a Building.
